title: Upgrade Dad’s cloud storage this Father’s Day
description:
Whether he’s traveling during retirement or taking pictures of the grandkids, your dad — like everyone — could use some more storage space. So, this Father’s Day, take advantage of a big discount on Koofr Cloud Storage.

Koofr is an intuitive cloud storage service accessible via web, mobile, and WebDav. Dad can easily connect his existing cloud accounts (Dropbox, Google Drive, Amazon, and OneDrive), and get everything organized in one place with far higher limits. With 1TB of cloud storage available, he’ll never run out of room.

Koofr is one of the most secure and convenient cloud solutions, too. It never tracks user activity, and offers helpful tools like a duplicate finder and bulk renaming tool to make it easier than ever to organize files and maximize space.

Koofr has earned 4.6/5 stars on G2, GetApp, and Capterra. Find out why when you lock in a deal for Dad. Right now, you can get 1TB of Koofr Cloud Storage for life for just $119.97.
